|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM638165TS-7; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |cm_down_c = |cm_up_c = |docsisver = 2.0 |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0F:66

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== BEFCMU10v3 S/Ns may start with '''KBG4'''.
The FCC docs indicate this device is an '''Askey''' CME105-D40. The EUT's board is silkscreened with "3003-000763".
"ID:03-000013", "REV-1A", and "3003-001103" is silkscreened on a production model board.
===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply shown with the device in the FCC photos is a '''Delta Electronics''' ADP-12SB Rev.B.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Delta Electronics |model = ADP-12S |revision = B |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=C13 |output_v=12 |output_a=1 |output_conn=barrel |output_c=DC |countrymanuf = China |style=modular, brick }}
